resources.string: We have the full graphical power of the Android framework. It\'s easy, for example, to right-align:
Actually, it\'s easy to do anything you can do with a TextView, using XML or programmatically. The PDF result will even be selectable!
This also means that text can be editable. See how nicely the text is split into pages or columns as you type:
We are not restricted to text in any way! With some layout skills, you can create beautiful documents or artworks, with a live preview.
